key.description: Identifies the key in the record column

column.description: Identifies the column in the record.

value.description: Expected value for the table, record, column and key.

record.description: Identifies the recoard in the table.

state.description: Configures the state of the key. When set to I(present), the I(key) and I(value) pair will be set on the I(record) and when set to I(absent) the I(key) will not be set.

timeout.description: How long to wait for ovs-vswitchd to respond

table.description: Identifies the table in the database.
